channel.title: javascript on The Pink Dev
channel.description: Recent content in javascript on The Pink Dev

item.title: Hannoi Tower
item.description: Project Requirements A classic Hannoi Tower, in Javascript Project Details See it in action here

item.title: Hangman Game
item.description: Project Description A fun mini Javascript project. This project was built purely with JS.

item.title: Real Time Bus Tracker
item.description: Project Description This project provides a visual real-time tracking display of the Route #1 of Boston, running between Harvard and Nubian.

item.title: Follow The Eyes
item.description: Project Description This project is all about mouse movements. The Eyes of our pink friend will follow your mouse all over the place.

item.title: PacMan Factory
item.description: Project Details This Project is a PacMan Factory, go back to the 80’s and have fun by randomly creating and adding PacMan figures to the DOM with ramdom speed and directions.

item.title: To-Do List
item.description: Project Description My very First To-Do List App This App was created using CSS, HTML, JSX, and React Components, to understand CRUD, and as an intro to useState.
